data.text: @SenTedCruz MORE IMPORTANTLY, What are YOU going to do for all those people (including children) in your state who need and are enrolled in the ACA Insurance?  Your BILLIONAIRE BUDDY Trump is eliminating their lifeline to Medical insurance (eliminating subsidies for the ACA). https://t.co/cxRsU6DV7b

@SenTedCruz Gathering in cities is essential to amplify our voices, but let’s push for real action too! Supporting @PahlaviReza could unify our fight for a free Iran. No more sitting on the sidelines, it's time to show strength!  #Get_Khamenie  @netanyahu #NoDealWithIRGC #RezaPahlavi‌
